name: Heirloom Tomato Margherita
description: Fresh mozzarella cheese, garlic oil, micro basil.
serverNotes: Classic Italian Margherita with fresh heirloom tomatoes, mozzarella, garlic oil, basil. Simple, fresh flavors. Pairs beautifully with Italian reds (Chianti, Sangiovese, Barbera), Italian whites (Pinot Grigio, Vermentino), or Prosecco. Perfect with Peroni or light lagers.

name: Meatball & Sausage
description: Peppadew peppers, marinated tomatoes, fresh ricotta, Parmesan cheese and parsley oil.
serverNotes: Hearty meat pizza with meatballs, sausage, peppadew peppers, ricotta, Parmesan. Bold, satisfying flavors. Pairs excellently with Italian reds (Chianti, Primitivo, Nero d'Avola), or medium-bodied reds like Merlot. Great with Italian beers or IPAs.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Tomato, mozzarella, provolone.
serverNotes: Unique pizza topped with Caesar salad, chicken, tomato, mozzarella, provolone. Light, fresh, satisfying. Pairs well with Italian whites (Pinot Grigio, Soave), light reds, or Prosecco. Crisp lagers and wheat beers complement nicely.

name: Fig & Prosciutto
description: Eggplant, asiago, arugula, aged balsamic.
serverNotes: Sophisticated pizza with sweet figs, prosciutto, eggplant, asiago, arugula, balsamic. Sweet-savory balance. Pairs wonderfully with Italian reds (Chianti Classico, Barbera d'Asti), rosé, or sparkling wines. Elegant choice for wine lovers.

name: Pepperoni
description: Diavolo sauce, mozzarella, asiago, hot honey.
serverNotes: Classic pepperoni with spicy diavolo sauce, mozzarella, asiago, hot honey drizzle. Sweet-spicy kick. Pairs great with Italian reds (Chianti, Montepulciano, Primitivo), off-dry Riesling for spice, or IPAs. Crowd-pleasing favorite.

name: Insalata Mista
description: Mixed greens, cucumber, tomato, house vinaigrette.
serverNotes: Light mixed green salad with cucumber, tomato, house vinaigrette. Fresh, simple, refreshing. Perfect starter or side. Pairs well with Italian whites (Pinot Grigio, Vermentino), Sauvignon Blanc, or light rosé. Great palate cleanser.

name: Grilled Caesar
description: With seasoned Tuscan bread croutons.
serverNotes: Classic grilled Caesar with romaine, Tuscan croutons, creamy dressing. Rich, savory. Add chicken, shrimp, or salmon. Pairs nicely with Italian whites (Pinot Grigio, Soave), Chardonnay, or light reds. Perfect with crisp lagers.

name: Burrata Caprese Salad
description: Fresh burrata mozzarella, heirloom tomato, basil, herb oil, and balsamic reduction.
serverNotes: Premium Caprese with creamy burrata, heirloom tomatoes, basil, balsamic. Fresh, elegant Italian classic. Pairs beautifully with Italian whites (Vermentino, Soave, Pinot Grigio), Prosecco, or light Italian reds. Perfect with rosé.

name: Chicken Piccata
description: Sautéed boneless chicken breast, white wine lemon caper butter sauce, spaghetti and roasted tomatoes.
serverNotes: Classic Italian chicken with bright lemon-caper butter sauce, spaghetti, roasted tomatoes. Light, elegant, flavorful. Pairs beautifully with Italian whites (Pinot Grigio, Vermentino, Soave), Sauvignon Blanc, or Chardonnay. Also great with light Italian reds or Prosecco.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Lightly breaded, pan fried chicken breast served over spaghetti with marinara, melted mozzarella, provolone, and Parmesan cheese.
serverNotes: Iconic Italian-American favorite. Breaded chicken, marinara, melted cheese, spaghetti. Hearty, comforting, crowd-pleasing. Pairs perfectly with Italian reds (Chianti, Sangiovese, Montepulciano), or Italian whites. Great with Peroni or Italian lagers. Family favorite.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Crisp slices of hand-breaded Italian eggplant with mozzarella, provolone, and Parmesan, served with spaghetti marinara.
serverNotes: Vegetarian classic with hand-breaded eggplant, melted cheeses, marinara, spaghetti. Hearty, satisfying without meat. Pairs excellently with Italian reds (Chianti, Barbera, Valpolicella), Italian whites, or Prosecco. Perfect vegetarian entrée option.

name: Ragu of Italian Meats
description: Slowly roasted pork, meatball, beef, chicken, and sausage in marinara over mezzi rigatoni.
serverNotes: Ultimate meat lover's dish. Five meats slow-roasted in marinara over mezzi rigatoni. Rich, hearty, indulgent. Pairs perfectly with bold Italian reds (Chianti Classico, Brunello, Amarone, Super Tuscans), or full-bodied reds. Great with craft beers. Signature dish.

name: Three Meatballs
description: On spaghetti marinara, with ricotta salata and micro basil.
serverNotes: Classic Italian comfort food. House-made meatballs, spaghetti, marinara, ricotta salata, basil. Simple, traditional, satisfying. Pairs wonderfully with Italian reds (Chianti, Sangiovese, Montepulciano, Barbera), or Italian whites. Perfect with Peroni. Traditional favorite.

name: Veal Marsala
description: Pan seared scaloppine of veal, prosciutto, mushrooms, and peas with spaghetti and feta cheese.
serverNotes: Classic veal scaloppine with Marsala wine sauce, prosciutto, mushrooms, peas, spaghetti, feta. Elegant, refined. Pairs beautifully with Italian reds (Barolo, Barbaresco, Chianti Classico), or full-bodied whites like Chardonnay. Premium Italian classic.

name: Filet Mignon
description: 8 oz. filet over roasted garlic and Parmesan mashed potatoes, roasted asparagus, topped with a red wine mushroom demi glace and bleu cheese crumbles.
serverNotes: Premium 8 oz. filet with red wine mushroom demi, bleu cheese, garlic Parmesan mash, asparagus. Tender, elegant, indulgent. Pairs perfectly with bold reds (Cabernet Sauvignon, Barolo, Brunello, Bordeaux blends), or premium Italian reds. Special occasion entrée.

name: Surf & Turf
description: Grilled 12 oz. New York sirloin and jumbo shrimp, over Parmesan mashed potatoes, fried Brussels sprouts and demi glace.
serverNotes: Best of both worlds! 12 oz. NY sirloin with jumbo shrimp, Parmesan mash, Brussels sprouts, demi. Rich, satisfying combination. Pairs excellently with bold reds (Cabernet, Merlot, Super Tuscans), or full-bodied Chardonnay. Premium surf & turf experience.

name: Berkshire Pork Osso Buco
description: Braised for hours until fall-off-the-bone tender, served with garlic-herb and taleggio polenta, with a mushroom demi-glace.
serverNotes: Braised Berkshire pork shank, fall-off-bone tender, creamy taleggio polenta, mushroom demi. Rich, comforting, sophisticated. Pairs beautifully with Italian reds (Barolo, Barbaresco, Brunello), or bold reds like Zinfandel. Slow-cooked perfection.

name: Berkshire Pork Chop
description: One pound, grilled chop, guanciale and sweet potato hash, apple butter, pomegranate seeds.
serverNotes: Premium 1 lb Berkshire pork chop with guanciale-sweet potato hash, apple butter, pomegranate. Sweet-savory balance, impressive presentation. Pairs wonderfully with Pinot Noir, Italian reds (Barbera, Dolcetto), off-dry Riesling, or rosé. Show-stopping entrée.

name: Grilled Veal Chop
description: One pound, grain-fed bone-in veal chop served over wild mushroom risotto, topped with a Gorgonzola dolce compound butter.
serverNotes: Premium 1 lb veal chop with wild mushroom risotto, gorgonzola dolce butter. Tender, elegant, indulgent. Pairs beautifully with Italian reds (Barolo, Barbaresco, Amarone), or full-bodied Chardonnay. Premium veal experience for special occasions.

name: Veal Chop Parmesan
description: One pound, grain-fed bone-in veal chop pounded thin and lightly breaded, topped with marinara, mozzarella, provolone and Parmesan. Served with sautéed broccoli rabe.
serverNotes: Premium veal chop parmesan - 1 lb breaded cutlet with marinara, melted cheeses, broccoli rabe. Classic elevated. Impressive presentation. Pairs perfectly with Italian reds (Chianti Classico, Brunello, Super Tuscans), or bold reds. Show-stopping Italian favorite.

name: Short Rib
description: 10 oz. bone-in short rib served over wild mushroom risotto and demi-glace.
serverNotes: Braised 10 oz. bone-in short rib, fall-off-bone tender, wild mushroom risotto, demi-glace. Rich, luxurious, melt-in-mouth. Pairs excellently with bold reds (Cabernet, Barolo, Amarone, Malbec), or Super Tuscans. Premium comfort food at its finest.

name: Mushroom Fiori
description: Fiori pasta tossed in a herbed wild mushroom cream sauce, smoked honey, porcini mushroom powder and Parmesan cheese.
serverNotes: Elegant vegetarian pasta with wild mushrooms, cream, smoked honey, porcini powder, Parmesan. Earthy, rich, sophisticated. Pairs beautifully with Italian reds (Barolo, Barbaresco, Chianti), full-bodied whites like Chardonnay, or Pinot Noir. Mushroom lover's dream.

name: Mezzi Rigatoni with Roasted Chicken
description: Pulled roasted chicken, wild mushrooms, peas, shallots, tomato, and crispy prosciutto in a pesto cream sauce.
serverNotes: Hearty pasta with roasted chicken, wild mushrooms, peas, prosciutto, pesto cream. Rich, satisfying, complex flavors. Contains nuts (pesto). Pairs excellently with Italian whites (Vermentino, Gavi), Italian reds (Chianti, Barbera), or Chardonnay. Crowd-pleasing favorite.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Pan-seared shrimp tossed with grape tomatoes, parsley, and garlic in a white wine lemon-butter sauce, served over spaghetti.
serverNotes: Classic shrimp scampi with garlic, white wine, lemon-butter, tomatoes, spaghetti. Light, fresh, garlicky. Pairs beautifully with Italian whites (Pinot Grigio, Vermentino, Soave), Sauvignon Blanc, or Chardonnay. Also great with Prosecco. Italian seafood classic.

name: Seafood Fra Diavolo
description: Sautéed shrimp, scallops, and lobster tossed with orecchiette pasta in a spicy red sauce.
serverNotes: Spicy seafood pasta with shrimp, scallops, lobster in spicy red sauce, orecchiette. Bold, luxurious, heat. Pairs excellently with Italian whites (Pinot Grigio, Vermentino), Italian rosé, or off-dry Riesling for spice. Also great with Prosecco or light reds.

name: Pappardelle Bolognese
description: A rich meat sauce of beef, pork, sausage, and a touch of tomato and cream.
serverNotes: Traditional Italian meat sauce with beef, pork, sausage, tomato, cream over wide pappardelle. Rich, hearty, comforting. Pairs perfectly with Italian reds (Chianti, Sangiovese, Barbera, Montepulciano), or medium-bodied reds. Classic Italian comfort food.

name: Pasta & Sauce
description: Choice of Pasta: Mezzi Rigatoni, Pappardelle, Fiori, Spaghetti, Cheese Ravioli, Orecchiette, Gluten-Free Penne. Choice of Sauce: Alfredo, Marinara, Pesto, Vodka.
serverNotes: Build your own pasta! Choose pasta shape and sauce (Alfredo, Marinara, Pesto, Vodka). Customizable, versatile. Gluten-free available. Pairs with Italian whites or reds depending on sauce choice. Great for simple, classic pasta cravings or picky eaters.

name: Seared Scallops
description: Fresh all natural seared sea scallops with a hot honey glaze, served with a corn, caramelized onion, bacon, and mascarpone risotto.
serverNotes: Premium seared scallops with hot honey glaze, sweet corn-bacon risotto. Sweet-savory, elegant. Pairs beautifully with Chardonnay, Italian whites (Vermentino, Gavi), Champagne, or off-dry Riesling. Also great with rosé. Show-stopping seafood dish.

name: North Atlantic Salmon
description: Fresh, grilled salmon, honeynut squash farro, cider-mascarpone cream, candied pumpkin seed.
serverNotes: Fresh grilled salmon with honeynut squash farro, cider-mascarpone cream, candied pumpkin seeds. Seasonal, balanced flavors. Pairs excellently with Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, Italian whites (Pinot Grigio, Vermentino), or rosé. Healthy, flavorful choice.

name: Lobster Risotto
description: Sautéed lobster meat with seasoned Roma tomatoes, smoky bacon and local basil over a creamy chopped spinach and Romano risotto.
serverNotes: Luxurious lobster risotto with tomatoes, bacon, basil, spinach, Romano. Rich, indulgent, creamy. Pairs beautifully with Chardonnay, Italian whites (Vermentino, Soave), Champagne, or light Italian reds. Premium seafood experience. Special occasion dish.

name: Tuscan Herb & Crumb Crusted Haddock
description: Baked, served with roasted potatoes and asparagus.
serverNotes: Baked haddock with Tuscan herb crust, roasted potatoes, asparagus. Light, flaky, herby. Simple preparation highlights fresh fish. Pairs wonderfully with Italian whites (Pinot Grigio, Vermentino, Soave), Sauvignon Blanc, or Chardonnay. Classic, approachable seafood.

name: Lobster Stuffed Shells
description: A mixture of lobster meat, lump crab, and shrimp with ricotta and mozzarella stuffed inside pasta shells then baked in a creamy lobster marinara sauce.
serverNotes: Indulgent stuffed shells with lobster, crab, shrimp, cheeses in creamy lobster marinara. Rich, decadent seafood pasta. Pairs perfectly with Italian whites (Pinot Grigio, Vermentino), Chardonnay, or Prosecco. Comfort food meets luxury seafood.
